name: UMediaPlateComponent
doc: This is a component for AMediaPlate that can play and show media in the world.

bPlayOnOpen: If set then play when opening the media.
bAutoPlay: If set then start playing when this object is active.
StartTime: What time to start playing from (in seconds).
SoundComponent: Holds the component to play sound.
StaticMeshComponent: Holds the component for the mesh.
Letterboxes: Holds the component for the mesh.
PlaylistIndex: The current index of the source in the play list being played.
bPlayOnlyWhenVisible: If true then only allow playback when the media plate is visible.
VisibleMipsTilesCalculations: Visible mips and tiles calculation mode for the supported mesh types in MediaPlate. (Player restart on change.)
MipMapBias: Media texture mip map bias shared between the (image sequence) loader and the media texture sampler.
bEnableMipMapUpscaling: If true then enable the use of MipLevelToUpscale as defined below.
MipLevelToUpscale: With exr playback, upscale into lower quality mips from this specified level. All levels including and above the specified value will be fully read.
bAdaptivePoleMipUpscaling: If true then Media Plate will attempt to load and upscale lower quality mips and display those at the poles (Sphere object only).
MediaTextureSettings: Exposes Media Texture settings via Media Plate component.
bIsMediaPlatePlaying:
If true, then we want the media plate to play.
Note that this could be true, but the player is not actually playing because
bPlayOnlyWhenVisible = true and the plate is not visible.
bLoop: If set then loop when we reach the end.
bIsAspectRatioAuto: If true then set the aspect ratio automatically based on the media.

methods.name: Close
methods.doc: Call this to close the media.

methods.name: GetIsAspectRatioAuto
methods.doc: Gets whether automatic aspect ratio is enabled.

methods.name: GetLetterboxAspectRatio
methods.doc: Call this to get the aspect ratio of the screen.

methods.name: GetLoop
methods.doc: Call this to see if we want to loop.

methods.name: GetMediaPlayer
methods.doc: Call this get our media player.

methods.name: GetMediaTexture
methods.doc: Call this get our media texture.

methods.name: GetMeshRange
methods.doc: Return the arc size in degrees used for visible mips and tiles calculations, specific to the sphere.

methods.name: IsMediaPlatePlaying
methods.doc: Call this to see if the media plate is playing.

methods.name: Open
methods.doc: Call this to open the media.

methods.name: Pause
methods.doc:
Call this to pause playback.
Play can be called to resume playback.

methods.name: Play
methods.doc:
Call this to start playing.
Open must be called before this.

methods.name: Rewind
Seek
SetIsAspectRatioAuto
methods.doc: Sets whether automatic aspect ratio is enabled.

methods.name: SetLetterboxAspectRatio
methods.doc: Call this to set the aspect ratio of the screen.

methods.name: SetMeshRange
methods.doc: Set the arc size in degrees used for visible mips and tiles calculations, specific to the sphere.
